name: DOWN (joanjoan)
description:
This is an indie game that allows players to experience free diving. 

Players will encounter different kinds of marine creatures during free exploration in a cave in the ocean. As you continue to dive, players will see things that are not visible on land, such as various forms of marine life, marine debris that composes a maze. The whole process is like the wonderful world after Alice fell into the rabbit hole in the classic fairy tale. And in the end, players will meet a whale and become friends with it. There are some interesting interactions that the player can have with this whale, such as swimming together and voice communication. 

During this process, players can gradually establish an emotional connection with ocean and marine life.
